info.title: API test platform API
info.description: This is the API for the API test platform. So you can test if your api's validate to the dutch government standards

API-version.description: Geeft een specifieke API-versie aan in de context van een specifieke aanroep. Voorbeeld: 1.2.1.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Perform conditional requests. This header should contain one or multiple ETag values of resources the client has cached. If the current resource ETag value is in this set, then an HTTP 304 empty body will be returned. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/If-None-Match) for details.

ETag.description: De ETag berekend op de response body JSON. Indien twee resources exact dezelfde ETag hebben, dan zijn deze resources identiek aan elkaar. Je kan de ETag gebruiken om caching te implementeren.

json_result.title: Json result
json_result.description: This is the downloaded api spec

type.title: Type
type.description: URI referentie naar het type fout, bedoeld voor developers

code.title: Code
code.description: Systeemcode die het type fout aangeeft

title.title: Title
title.description: Generieke titel voor het type fout

detail.title: Detail
detail.description: Extra informatie bij de fout, indien beschikbaar

instance.title: Instance
instance.description: URI met referentie naar dit specifiek voorkomen van de fout. Deze kan gebruikt worden in combinatie met server logs, bijvoorbeeld.

name.title: Name
name.description: Naam van het veld met ongeldige gegevens

code.title: Code
code.description: Systeemcode die het type fout aangeeft

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Uitleg wat er precies fout is met de gegevens

type.title: Type
type.description: URI referentie naar het type fout, bedoeld voor developers

code.title: Code
code.description: Systeemcode die het type fout aangeeft

title.title: Title
title.description: Generieke titel voor het type fout

detail.title: Detail
detail.description: Extra informatie bij de fout, indien beschikbaar

instance.description: URI met referentie naar dit specifiek voorkomen van de fout. Deze kan gebruikt worden in combinatie met server logs, bijvoorbeeld.

subdomain.title: Subdomain
subdomain.description: The subdomain under which the service has been exposed

session.title: Session
session.description: The session to which this exposed URL belongs

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Postman test suite

version.title: Version
version.description:
Indicates the version of the Postman test suite, allowing for different
        versions under the same name

test_scenario.title: Test scenario
test_scenario.description: The name of the test scenario to which this Postman test is linked

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of this environment

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of this provider run, needed to retrieve the badge

started.title: Started at
started.description: The time at which the provider run was started

stopped.title: Stopped at
stopped.description: The time at which the provider run was stopped

client_id.title: Client id
client_id.description: If the test scenario requires JWT authentication, this field will be used to construct a JWT

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: If the test scenario requires JWT authentication, this field will be used to construct a JWT

status.title: Status
status.description: Indicates the status of this provider run

percentage_exec.title: Percentage exec
percentage_exec.description: Indicates what percentage of the provider run has been executed

status_exec.title: Status exec
status_exec.description: Indicates the status of execution of the provider run

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of this provider run, needed to retrieve the badge

started.title: Started at
started.description: The time at which the provider run was started

stopped.title: Stopped at
stopped.description: The time at which the provider run was stopped

client_id.title: Client id
client_id.description: If the test scenario requires JWT authentication, this field will be used to construct a JWT

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: If the test scenario requires JWT authentication, this field will be used to construct a JWT

status.title: Status
status.description: Indicates the status of this provider run

percentage_exec.title: Percentage exec
percentage_exec.description: Indicates what percentage of the provider run has been executed

status_exec.title: Status exec
status_exec.description: Indicates the status of execution of the provider run

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this session type

application.title: Application
application.description: The application for which this session type is relevant

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of this session type

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: The type of authentication that is used for this session type

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of this session, needed to retrieve the badge

session_type.title: Session type
session_type.description: The session type of this session

started.title: Started at
started.description: The time at which the session was started

stopped.title: Stopped at
stopped.description: The time at which the session was stopped

status.title: Status
status.description: Indicates the status of this session

deploy_status.title: Deploy status
deploy_status.description: Indicates the status of deployment of the session

deploy_percentage.title: Deploy percentage
deploy_percentage.description: Indicates what percentage of the deployment is finished

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The universally unique identifier of this session, needed to retrieve the badge

started.title: Started at
started.description: The time at which the session was started

stopped.title: Stopped at
stopped.description: The time at which the session was stopped

status.title: Status
status.description: Indicates the status of this session

sandbox.title: Sandbox
sandbox.description: If enabled, whenever multiple calls are made to the same path, the result of the call is overridden every time

url.title: Url
url.description:
URL pattern that will be compared
    with the request and eventually matched.
    Wildcards can be added, e.g. '/test/{uuid}/stop'
    will match the URL '/test/c5429dcc-6955-4e22-9832-08d52205f633/stop'.

http_method.title: Http method
http_method.description: The HTTP method that must be tested for this scenario case

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: The collection of scenario cases to which this scenario case belongs
